Featured Partner Hotels

Join us at the start of the new year on the shores of Panamá for the return of Latin America’s #1 destination festival, The Day After. Though the three-day event is many months away, you can start planning the perfect lodging for your needs to rest-up after dancing the day away. Since there’s no shortage of hotels and accommodations located near Figali Plaza, we’ve partnered with a few of our favorites to help make your decision a little easier.
